title: Puss in Boots (2011 film)
summary: Puss in Boots is a 2011 American computer-animated, comedy film[4] produced by DreamWorks Animation and distributed by Paramount Pictures. It is directed by Chris Miller, who also directed Shrek the Third (2007), from a screenplay by Tom Wheeler and a story by Brian Lynch, Will Davies, and Wheeler. It stars Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Zach Galifianakis, Billy Bob Thornton, and Amy Sedaris.
